description.en: Lower half of the Split Wide layout. The Russians close in through musket smoke. Fallen soldiers lie scattered as the Swedish line braces behind hastily built defenses. A Russian officer points his sword toward the Swedish position, shouting an order as cannon fire rumbles in the distance.

narration.en: The air thickens with smoke and iron — the struggle for Jutas tightens.

info: Page 7 – Russian Advance. PageType: 2. Scene (panel 2): close combat imminent, smoke and confusion rising over the field.
